episodes.title: 10 most ridiculous declarations from the Watchtower
episodes.description: The Watchtower society has made numerous declarations throughout it's history that we could make a top 100 I believe. So I decided to take the top 10 (according to me) and compile it on this video. I left out main doctrinal things that could be debated for a long time, such as the trinity or soul sleep, etc. Just the nonsensical stuff.

episodes.title: The New World Translation alters the original Greek text of the Bible
episodes.description:
Does the Watchtower change the original texts of the Bible? In this video we examine the Greek text and identify changes present in many verses of the New World Translation.

Mark 5:19 - Mark 1:4 - Luke 23:43 - John 1:1 - John 1:12 - John 6:56 - John 8:58 - John 14:14 - Acts 10:36 - Romans 8:1 - Romans 8:23 - Romans 8:29 - Romans 9:5 - Romans 10:13 - Romans 13:1 - 1 Corinthians 10:4 - 1 Corinthians 14:14-16 - Galatians 6:18 - Colossians 1:16-20 - Colossians 1:19 - Colossians 2:6-12 - Colossians 2:9 - 1 Timothy 4:1 - Titus 2:13 - Hebrews 9:14 - Hebrews 12:9 - Hebrews 12:23 - Hebrews 12:28 - 1 Peter 1:11 - 1 John 4:1-6 - Jude 19

For a longer list of perverted verses
1) Go to the site
2) Scroll down

http://www.bible.ca/Jw-NWT.htm

episodes.description:
Yes! Another video on Jehovah's witnesses / Watchtower's history.
This one is a bit more detailed and includes scans of the information at the end.
Thank you for watching!

episodes.title: Jehovah's witnesses are NOT prophets! jw.org
episodes.description: If you still think that Jehovah's witnesses are prophets after viewing this video, well, you just might be right. They did claim to be prophets like Jeremiah and Ezekiel. They did prophesy in Jehovah's name through Christ Jesus. They did claim to have God's Holy Spirit and that he touched their lips. They did claim to speak under angelic direction and support and that their words were directed from heaven. They did challenge people to review their record. So I guess that would make them prophets. Wait a minute! They also ONLY made wrong predictions, including proclaiming a date for armageddon 6 times. This seems to make them FALSE prophets.
